settings.title: Option #1 The “Sourdough Starter” Shortcut
settings.text:
Your friendly, instant Gluten-Free Sourdough Starter

  • The Starter Bottle “Home” For Your Starter To Live In
  • Built in Thermometer
  • Feeding Tracker
  • ​Measurement Band
  • Solid Cap + The “Cute Hat”
  • Fabric Cap
  • ​Additional item #1…
settings.link_label: Yes - I Want The Easy Way to Bake Delicious Sourdough Faster!

settings.title: Option #2The “Easy Baking Experience” Shortcut
settings.text:
In addition to everything in the “Sourdough Starter”.
You’re also getting…

  • Banneton 9-inch Round Proofing Basket
  • Banneton 9-inch Oval Proofing Basket
  • Danish Whisk
  • ​Bowl and Dough Scraper
  • Dough Measurement Blade
  • ​Bread Lame with 5 Blades
settings.link_label: Yes - I Want to Shortcut the Sourdough Learning Curve

settings.title: Option #3 The Ultimate Sourdough Shortcut
settings.text:
In addition to everything in the “Sourdough Starter”.
And everything in the “Easy Baking Experience”
You’re also getting the core ingredients you need to bake a handful of recipes, including to create your own Gluten Free Sourdough House White
Including: White rice flour, Oat flour, Tapioca flour, Potato starch, Psyllium husk and more…
settings.link_label: Yes - I Want the Ultimate Shortcut to Sourdough Baking

custom_css: a.link.animate-arrow {text-align: center; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: 600; background-color: rgb(235, 108, 33); font-size: 14px; box-shadow: inset 0 2px 2px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.22), 0 233px 233px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12) inset; border-radius: 6px; border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); padding: 15px;}

settings.text:
And of course – All of this comes with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. That way you are fully in control. And empowered to choose what’s best for you.

If for whatever reason you change your mind, or if there is anything at all that you don’t like about this kit – We’re more than happy to give you a full refund.
Simply email us to let us know, and return the kits to us within 60 days. And we’ll refund you in full, instantly.

We’ll even refund you for your digital bundle too - as a way of saying thanks for giving gluten free sourdough a go.

Which sounds pretty fair if you ask me!

At first I really didn't want to spend any extra money on fancy tools, as I was skeptical it could make such a big difference. But this basket and lame gave me the dark crispy crust with good ears that I couldn't get another way. Even my kids noticed - They love it!

– Mia, San Francisco 

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Great Product! Fast delivery! Excellent Quality! Every Sourdough starter is different. This one was ready fast. i Definitely Recommend it if you're a beginner. PS: Most starters from scratch take 2 to 6 weeks to get going. This was ready to bake with in just over 1 week.
– Maxi, Rome

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

This was perfect for helping me get started in making sourdough breads. Every must have feature is in this package. If you're just starting out and not sure where to start this is the product you want. Helps keep everything in a nice tidy spot and easy to monitor your starters progress.
– Lauren, Seattle

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

settings.heading: When Will My Kit Be At My Door?
settings.row_content: If you live within the US, everything will be with you in 3-4 working days. For international deliveries, please allow for up to 12 working days.

settings.heading: What If I Don’t Like It?
settings.row_content: You can have a full refund – just email Info@bloomhealthy.co within 60 days of purchase, and return the complete kit in its original packaging. We’ll be happy to quickly give you a full refund.

settings.heading: What If I Change My Mind?
settings.row_content: No worries – Just simply email Info@bloomhealthy.co within 60 days of purchase to let us know, and return the complete kit in its original packaging. We’ll be happy to quickly give you a full refund.

settings.heading: Is This All Gluten Free?
settings.row_content: Yes – We only use 100% gluten free ingredients in all of the recipes in this course. That’s part of what makes these recipes, and this course, so special.

settings.heading: Is This Suitable For Vegans?
settings.row_content: Yes – All recipes are either vegan friendly, or suggest vegan substitutions.
